channel.title: CVE Feed for Meta -- Tacquito
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Meta -- Tacquito

item.title: CVE-2024-49400|2024-10-17T20:48:52.229Z -- meta -- tacquito
item.description: Tacquito prior to commit 07b49d1358e6ec0b5aa482fcd284f509191119e2 was not properly performing regex matches on authorized commands and arguments. Configured allowed commands/arguments were intended to require a match on the entire string, but instead only enforced a match on a sub-string. That would have potentially allowed unauthorized commands to be executed.

item.title: CVE-2024-49400|2024-10-17T17:15:17.191Z -- meta -- tacquito
item.description: Tacquito prior to commit 07b49d1358e6ec0b5aa482fcd284f509191119e2 was not properly performing regex matches on authorized commands and arguments. Configured allowed commands/arguments were intended to require a match on the entire string, but instead only enforced a match on a sub-string. That would have potentially allowed unauthorized commands to be executed.
